mapper.select: select a.device_code, a.id, a.material_codes, b.id as device_id, b.name as device_name, dt.name as device_type_name, dt.code as device_type_code, b.line_code, cl.line_name, cs.station_code, cs.station_name, a.fault_code, csp.position_code, csp.position_name from fault_device a LEFT JOIN device b ON a.device_code = b.code LEFT JOIN device_type dt on b.device_type_code = dt.code LEFT JOIN cs_line cl on b.line_code = cl.line_code LEFT JOIN cs_station cs on b.station_code = cs.station_code LEFT JOIN cs_station_position csp on csp.position_code = b.position_code where a.fault_code = #{faultCode} AND cl.del_flag =0 and cs.del_flag =0 AND b.del_flag =0

select a.*, b.id as deviceId, b.name as deviceName, f.fault_phenomenon as faultPhenomenon, dt.name as device_type_name, dt.code as device_type_code, b.line_code, b.station_code, b.position_code, cl.line_name, cs.station_code, cs.station_name, a.fault_code, csp.position_code, csp.position_name, f.symptoms as symptoms, b.system_code as systemCode, f.receive_user_name as receiveUserName, f.major_code as majorCode from fault_device a LEFT JOIN fault f on a.fault_code = f.code LEFT JOIN fault_repair_record frr on frr.fault_code = f.code LEFT JOIN device b ON a.device_code = b.code LEFT JOIN device_type dt on b.device_type_code = dt.code LEFT JOIN cs_line cl on b.line_code = cl.line_code LEFT JOIN cs_station cs on b.station_code = cs.station_code LEFT JOIN cs_station_position csp on csp.position_code = b.position_code
cl.del_flag =0 and cs.del_flag =0 AND b.del_flag =0 and a.del_flag = 0 and frr.processing = 2 and f.status = 12
and b.system_code =#{condition.systemCode}
and a.device_code like concat('%', #{condition.deviceCode}, '%')
and b.name like concat('%', #{condition.deviceName}, '%')
and a.repair_status = #{condition.repairStatus}
ORDER BY a.repair_status ASC,a.create_time DESC

select su.username from cs_user_depart cud left join sys_user su on su.id = cud.user_id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id = su.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = sur.role_id WHERE sr.role_code = 'foreman' AND su.org_id in ( select org_id from sys_user where username = #{receiveUserName} ) GROUP BY su.id
select su.username from sys_user su left join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id = su.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = sur.role_id where sr.role_name = '送修经办人'
